channel.title: The Space Of Future: Radio
channel.itunes:summary: Make sure you tune in every week to catch up to all latest tunes, remixes, bootlegs and more! More info: https://thespaceoffuture.com

channel.description: Make sure you tune in every week to catch up to all latest tunes, remixes, bootlegs and more! More info: https://thespaceoffuture.com

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #9
item.description:
On this week's TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of David Guetta, Afrojack, CMC$, Alex Sombo, A R I Z O N A, Matisse & Sadko, Armin van Buuren and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Afrojack & David Guetta - Hero 03. Richello - All We Are 04. Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike vs Vini Vici - Get In Trouble (So What)(Audiotricz Remix) 05. CMC$, Gia Koka, Yael Nahar, Jonas Kröper - Oh Mama 06. Alex Sombo x MVRE - Be Free (feat. Alex Sombo) 07. Louis The Child - So What feat. A R I Z O N A 08. Jeffrey Sutorius feat. Krimsonn - Nostalgia 09. Matisse & Sadko, Alex Aris - Heal Me 10. Hook N Sling, Galantis, Karen Harding - The Best 11. Diplo - One By One (feat. Elderbrook & Andhim) 12. Sarah Reeves - Not My Style (R3HAB Remix) 13. Above & Beyond, Armin van Buuren - Show Me Love (Sander van Doorn Extended Remix) 14. Sofia Carson & Tiësto Fool's Gold (24 Karat Gold Edition) 15. Damon Sharpe and Josh Cumbee - Lost Years 16. Triple M, Samlight & Stage Republic - Fields Of Gold 17. Zwette - Rooftop in Amsterdam ft. Alex Hosking 18. Curtis Lowe - Lost in You 19. Caseet - Flow Over Others

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #8
item.description:
On this week's TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Janamina Bandara, Armin van Buuren, Nicky Romero, Tobu, Sandro Cavazza, AVIAN GRAYS, Lost Frequencies and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Janamina Bandara - Thunderbird 03. Armin van Buuren, Maor Levi - Divino 04. Tobu - Won't Let You Down 05. Nicky Romero & Teamworx ft. Joseph Feinstein - World Through Your Eyes 06. Nea, Sandro Cavazza - Don't Deserve This (Animal Elektric Remix) 07. Duncan Laurence - Arcade (Sam Feldt Remix) 08. Sleepwalkrs - Goodnight (feat. JP Cooper) 09. Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike, Azteck & Angemi - We'll Be Dancing Soon 10. AVIAN GRAYS - Crying 'Bout You 11. Alycium - You Set My World on Fire 12. Duumu, Majent - Burnt Out 13. Dastic, twoDB & Over Easy featLinney - Anywhere Tonight 14. Valerie Broussard, Galantis - Roots 15. VARGENTA & Arild Aas - Way That You Do 16. Major Lazer - Lay Your Head On Me (feat. Marcus Mumford) (Lost Frequencies Remix) 17. Mitte - Miss You, BLKCUBE 18. 3LAU, Justin Caruso - Better With You (Kastra & twoDB Remix) 19. Fajar Asia Music - Specialist 20. Mike Posner - Momma Always Told Me (feat. Stanaj & Yung Bae) 21. Sander van Doorn - Drink To Get Drunk (Eli & Fur Remix)

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #7
item.description:
On this week's TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Funk D, TMW, Kygo, Alan Walker, Tiësto, Lucky Rose, Julian Jordan and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Funk D x Ayin x Fasto - Lipstick (ft. Brendan Cleary) 03. TMW - All of My Love (Riggi & Piros Remix) 04. Kygo - Gone Are The Days (Visualizer) ft. James Gillespie 05. Aiobahn & Mick Mazoo - Never Go Back 06. AZU - High (feat. Hannah Abrahim) 07. Chico Rose & Williams88 - Reach For The Sky 08. DJ Snake, Selena Gomez - Selfish Love (Tiësto Remix) 09. Eren AB - Beauty Lies With You 10. GAMPER & DADONI - Perfect (For Somebody Else) (feat. Dewain Whitmore) 11. J. Balvin, Khalid - Otra Noche Sin Ti 12. Julian Jordan & WILL K - The Box 13. Lewis Capaldi - Someone You Loved (Laibert Remix) 14. Lucky Rose x Jason Walker - Help [Ultra Music] 15. Mauve - Here Comes The Sun 16. Milly, Farruko, Jay Wheeler, Nio Garcia & Amenazzy - No Te Enamores (Alan Walker Remix) 17. SICK INDIVIDUALS feat EKKO - Flame 18. Steve Aoki & Farruko - Aire 19. Sylow, Yann Muller, Marphil - Sunrise 20. Diplo - MMXX XIII (feat. Lunice) [Kornél Kovács Remix]

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #6
item.description:
On this week's TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of R3HAB, Justin Mylo, Ellis, Alan Walker, AREA21, Armin van Buuren, Vicetone and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. R3HAB x Andy Grammer - Close To You 03. Jay Hardway - In My Head 04. Justin Mylo - I Remember (feat. STRNGRS) 05. Ellis - The Taste [Monstercat Release] 06. AREA21 - La La La 07. Armin van Buuren feat. RBVLN - Weight Of The World 08. Vicetone - Elevate 09. Liu, Stonefox, Alok, AVIAN GRAYS - All I Want (AVIAN GRAYS Remix) 10. Plastik Funk, Sickrate, Rentz & Repiet - Never Let Go 11. Zoe Wees - Girls Like Us (Felix Jaehn Remix) 12. Jubël - 4AM 13. Palm Trees & MdL - Fast Lane ft. Abi F Jones 14. Niiko x SWAE - Friends 15. Courier - San Francisco (Alex Schulz Remix) 16. Vincent & The Griswolds - Lost & In Love 17. Kbubs & Jake Neumar - Top Of New York 18. Nightcall, Karma Child & Gia Koka - Wasted Love 19. Wholm & Cageman - Born Again (feat. Michael Shynes) 20. Gavin James - Always (Alan Walker Remix) 21. LYOD x The Bayton Fields - Do It For Love

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #5
item.description:
On this week's TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Martin Jensen, Don Diablo, Kashyap, Alan Walker, R3HAB, Afrojack, Armin var Buuren and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Martin Jensen - Solo Dance 03. Don Diablo - Eyes Closed 04. ID - Dawn [RAX Label] 05. AuRa x Alan Walker - Dead Girl! 06. R3HAB x Fafaq x DNF - Ringtone 07. Sultan + Shepard feat. Nadia Ali & IRO - Almost Home 08. Mike Perry & Mila Josef - If I Ruled The World 09. Vicetone - Somebody Like You ft. Lena Leon 10. Petit Biscuit - Parachute (Tony Romera Remix) 11. Andrew Rayel - Silver Lining (DubVision Remix) 12. Timmy Trumpet & Afrojack - Stay Mine 13. Armin var Buuren - Rain (FERR by Ferry Corsten Rework) 14. Tim Hox & NEVERGLOW - Thymus 15. Joel Corry x RAYE - David Guetta - BED - [Joel Corry VIP Mix] 16. Bossfight - Endgame 17. Matt Nash & Mojjo - Kryptonite (feat. Lucas Ariel) 18. Stadiumx & Timmo Hendriks ft. Robbie Rosen - Remember 19. Kiiara - So Sick [feat. blackbear] [Martin Jensen Remix] 20. Five Feet Apart - Don't Give Up On Me

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #4
item.description:
On this week’s TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Cheat Codes, Florian Picasso, Brando, Maroon 5, Calvin Harris, Marshmello, Edwin Bennett and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Cheat Codes x Kris Kross Amsterdam - SEX 03. Florian Picasso - Get Away 04. Monocule - You Don't Know 05. Maroon 5 - Beautiful Mistakes ft. Megan Thee Stallion 06. Miley Cyrus - Prisoner (Lyrics) ft. Dua Lipa 07. Youngr feat. Bright Sparks - Brothers & Sisters 08. MasterBroke - Good Bye 09. Edwin Bennett - Love For Trance Melody 10. Bebe Rexha - Sacrifice 11. Calvin Harris - This Is What You Came For ft. Rihanna 12. Justin Bieber - Hold On 13. Mabel - Don't Call Me Up 14. MANLO - Dancing in the Sky (feat. Danny Belda) 15. Michael Calfan x INNA - Call Me Now 16. Nick Jonas - This Is Heaven 17. Powfu - death bed (coffee for your head) ft. beabadoobee 18. Rita Ora x Imanbek - Big ft. David Guetta, Gunna 19. Ali Gatie x Marshmello x Ty Dolla $ign - Do You Believe

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #3
item.description:
On this week’s TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Lost Frequencies, Alesso, Brando, KSHMR, Don Diablo, Avicii, Marshmello and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Lost Frequencies - Rise 03. Alesso x CORSAK - Going Dumb 04. Brando - Yes or No 05. Camp Kubrick & Don Diablo - falling for you 06. KSHMR - I Will Be A Lion (feat. Jake Reese) 07. Souveek & Jxjay - Follow Up 08. ArtLec - We'll Stay Together 09. Borgeous - Oh Baby Oh Baby 10. Dermot Kennedy - Power Over Me 11. GOLDHOUSE ,Mokita - Washout 12. Hotel Garuda - Olivia (LILO Remix) 13. Hoved - Let You Go (Tungevaag Edit) 14. Justus - Meant To Be 15. Manse & JRL feat. Jonny Rose - Outlaws 16. OTR - Heart ft. Shallou 17. Roman Müller - Blame (Lyrics) ft. Matt Wills 18. Vigiland, Alexander Tidebrink - Were The Same 19. Wild Cards - It Girl feat. Lucas Marx 20. Pontifexx, Audax, Chris Willis - You Are The One 21. item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #2
item.description:
On this week’s TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Imagine Dragons, ILLENIUM, R3HAB, Mike Wiliams, Nicky Romero, Jonas Aden, Syn Cole and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Diviners, BUNT, Tom Bailey - Out Of Time 03. Imagine Dragons - Follow You 04. R3HAB x Timmy Trumpet x W&W - Distant Memory 05. ILLENIUM & Iann Dior- First Time 06. Mike Wiliams & Jonas Aden I Hope You Know (Chill Mix) 07. Syn Cole ft kaspara - Breathe (Sunrise Mix) [Ultra] 08. Kryzonium - Tearout 09. Nicky Romero - You Used To 10. Nick Jonas - 2Drunk 11. James Arthur - Medicine 12. Loretta - left u on read 13. Declan J Donovan - Before You Let Me Go 14. Gretta Ray - Bigger Than Me 15. Ali Gatie - Can't Let You Go 16. bülow - First Place 17. Christopher - Fall So Hard 18. Ellis - Orbit 19. slenderbodies and tim atlas - focus 20. Nhat Bya - HUE 21. LunchMoney Lewis - Ocean

item.title: The Space Of Future: Radio #1
item.description:
On this week’s TSOF: Radio has world premieres and brand new music from the likes of Avicii, Kygo, Martin Garrix, Selena Gomez, Nicky Romero, Taylor swift, OneRepublic and many more.
Tracklist:
01. The Space Of Future - Intro 02. Kygo, Avicii, Sandro Cavazza - Forever Yours (Avicii Tribute) 03. The Weeknd - Blinding Lights 04. R3HAB, ZAYN & Jungleboi - Flames (Frank Walker Remix) 05. Nicky Romero - Back To You 06. Marshmello - Alone 07. Justin Timberlake - CAN'T STOP THE FEELING! 08. Imagine Dragons - Thunder 09. Taylor Swift - Blank Space 10. OneRepublic - Counting Stars 11. TONES AND I - DANCE MONKEY 12. Alesso & Armin van Buuren - Leave A Little Love (Club Mix) 13. Avicii - Without You Audio ft. Sandro Cavazza 14. Sia - Original (from the Dolittle soundtrack) 15. K-391 & Alan Walker - Ignite (feat. Julie Bergan & Seungri) 16. Matisse & Sadko - Meant To Be 17. Selena Gomez, Rauw Alejandro - Baila Conmigo 18. Martin Garrix feat. Tove Lo - Pressure
